## Request for Tender for First Aid Training - National Capital Region

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-824-23514217
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: 10077929-002

### Tender Closing Information

* **Tender Closing Date**: May 16, 2024 - 2:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 10, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2027

### Services and Requirements

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the provision of standard First Aid training and Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) services for its personnel in the National Capital Region. The successful bidder will be required to provide training services for a period of three (3) years with option periods for two (2) additional one (1) year periods.

The bidder must be able to provide a minimum of two (2) and a maximum of four (4) instructor candidates qualified to teach the most recent First Aid and CPR techniques as outlined in the Canada Occupational Health and Safety Regulations and the National Joint Council’s Occupational Health and Safety Directive.

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Open Competitive Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: The bidder must be willing to comply with various international trade agreements, including the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Émilie Charbonneau
* **Email**: [emilie.charbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:emilie.charbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (873) 355-4701

### Documents and Attachments

The tender and associated documents can be found on the Buy and Sell website of Public Services and Procurement Canada at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

Note: All bidder information and questions will be posted on the website.
